column4: anyone help me with minecraft and why its crashes? it worked and then i turned on my nvidia graphics and now it crashes
well i went to the nvidia graphics settings and it says i have to run a boot command and restart x server but it wont do it when i type it into the terminal
well i went to the nvidia graphics settings and it says i have to run a boot command and restart x server but it wont do it when i type it into the terminal
